array.string:
dialog_tool="$OMC_OMC_SUPPORT_PATH/omc_dialog_control" "$dialog_tool" "$OMC_ACTIONUI_WINDOW_UUID" 1 omc_table_set_columns "First Name" "Action" "$dialog_tool" "$OMC_ACTIONUI_WINDOW_UUID" 1 omc_table_set_column_widths 100 100 "$dialog_tool" $OMC_ACTIONUI_WINDOW_UUID 1 omc_table_remove_all_rows printf "John	Enable
Jack	Disable
Jill	Hide
" | "$dialog_tool" "$OMC_ACTIONUI_WINDOW_UUID" 1 omc_table_add_rows_from_stdin
WINDOW_UUID="${OMC_OBJ_TEXT}" if [ -n "${WINDOW_UUID}" ]; then "$OMC_OMC_SUPPORT_PATH/omc_dialog_control" "$WINDOW_UUID" omc_window omc_terminate_cancel fi

dict.string: Test command designed to receive OMC_ACTIONUI_WINDOW_UUID from text context

array.string:
term_file="/tmp/OMC_test_actionui_term_${OMC_ACTIONUI_WINDOW_UUID}" term_tmp="${term_file}.tmp" echo "TERM_COMPLETE=YES" > "$term_tmp" echo "OMC_ACTIONUI_WINDOW_UUID=${OMC_ACTIONUI_WINDOW_UUID}" >> "$term_tmp" echo "VIEW_1_VALUE=${OMC_ACTIONUI_VIEW_1_VALUE}" >> "$term_tmp" echo "TABLE_1_COLUMN_0_VALUE=${OMC_ACTIONUI_TABLE_1_COLUMN_0_VALUE}" >> "$term_tmp" echo "TABLE_1_COLUMN_1_VALUE=${OMC_ACTIONUI_TABLE_1_COLUMN_1_VALUE}" >> "$term_tmp" echo "TABLE_1_COLUMN_2_VALUE=${OMC_ACTIONUI_TABLE_1_COLUMN_2_VALUE}" >> "$term_tmp" echo "TABLE_1_COLUMN_3_VALUE=${OMC_ACTIONUI_TABLE_1_COLUMN_3_VALUE}" >> "$term_tmp" echo "TABLE_1_COLUMN_0_ALL_ROWS=${OMC_ACTIONUI_TABLE_1_COLUMN_0_ALL_ROWS//$'
'/,}" >> "$term_tmp" echo "TABLE_1_COLUMN_1_ALL_ROWS=${OMC_ACTIONUI_TABLE_1_COLUMN_1_ALL_ROWS//$'
'/,}" >> "$term_tmp" echo "TABLE_1_COLUMN_2_ALL_ROWS=${OMC_ACTIONUI_TABLE_1_COLUMN_2_ALL_ROWS//$'
'/,}" >> "$term_tmp" mv "$term_tmp" "$term_file"
